ratings.comment: A lot of people like Lindsay, but I personally think she is incredibly immature.  She thinks she's hilarious, but she comes across as unintelligent.  She is VERY BIASED and subtly pushes her views a lot.  The class is easy because we watch movies, but I can't believe I'm paying tuition to watch and analyze "knocked up." Huge waste of time.

Lindsay is a fantastic professor. The description of her as Tina Fey in professor form is spot on, she is bubbly and excited and clearly loves what she does. The class is very easy, I stopped using the books after the second week. As long as you're a decent writer you should have no problems. I always look forward to this class with her.

Lindsay is amazing and I actually looked forward to lecture. You can tell that she loves what she does and she makes the material fun to learn. The books are supplemental to the lecture, but lecture is not a chore by any means. The class was interesting and fun, all thanks to her.
Lindsay is amazing. Pretty sure she is Tina Fey in professor form. Would take any class offered by her!

Lindsay is Tina Fey in teacher version, she is hilarious and awesome. By far my favorite teacher and lecturer. Super nice and willing to answer questions. pretty easy class, pop quizzes can be annoying
SHE IS AWESOME. best prof i've had at madison. she's hilarious, and i'm pretty sure she's tina feye. but really recommend her and this class! tests easy, but information is interesting.

i took comm arts 250 with lindsay. she is absolutely the best professor. so enthusiastic and not boring at all. the info is in depth but the midterm was easy. most definitely would recommend this class!
Lindsay is an awesome TA! She's really helpful and makes class interesting. She's definitely a fair grader.  I would recommend taking her as a TA. She's also lecturing 250 in Fall 2011.
